title: WSB's Weekend Bite Week Ending March 18: Allocating Capital In A Market Correction
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: On this week's episode we discuss the market correction, where to allocate capital with Catherine Faddis, CEO of Grace Capital and strong dividend yield stocks with Steven Cress, Head of SA's Quant Strategy.
